content.p: Look to this diagram when answering the following questions.

image.alt: Arrow pointing down and arrow pointing up between the terms Lungs and Heart. Arrow pointing down and arrow pointing up between the terms Heart and Body.

body.p: Systemic circulation would include which two pieces of this double pump?

response.feedback: Incorrect. The flow of blood between the heart and the lungs is the pulmonary circulation.
Correct. The flow of blood between the heart and the body is the systemic circulation.
Incorrect. The blood does not go directly from the lungs to the body. It must pass through the heart.

part.hint: The circulatory system can be described as having two parts: the pulmonary circulation and the systemic circulation.
